Large sun-filled living room with bay windows, full dining room that can fit a table that seats 6. Off the dining room is the large bedroom that can comfortably fit a queen sized bed and two dressers. The eat-in kitchen features a brand new floor and a gas range. One occupant. Credit score above 700. NO Pets. Available 10/1. First, Last, Security, and Brokers
